Module pipeline
Package tcpassos.pipeline

Interface CircularPipeline<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements processed by the pipeline
All Superinterfaces:
BasePipeline<T,Optional<T>>
public interface CircularPipeline<T> extends BasePipeline<T,Optional<T>>
Represents a circular pipeline that processes elements of type T and returns an optional result of type T. The circular pipeline executes a base pipeline repeatedly until it returns an empty optional.
